description: Information about the acceptance and relative priority assigned to the goal by the patient, practitioners and other stake-holders.

element.definition: Information about the acceptance and relative priority assigned to the goal by the patient, practitioners and other stake-holders.
The person whose acceptance/priority is being reflected.
element.name: individual

element.definition: Indicates whether the specified individual has accepted the goal or not.
element.name: status

binding.description: Codes indicating whether the goal has been accepted by a stakeholder

element.definition: Indicates the relative priority assigned to the resource by the stakeholder.
element.name: priority

binding.description: Codes indicating the relative priority assigned to a goal by a stakeholder

element.name: extension

element.comments: The definition may point directly to a computable or human-readable definition of the extensibility codes, or it may be a logical URI as declared in some other specification. The definition should be version specific.  This will ideally be the URI for the Resource Profile defining the extension, with the code for the extension after a #.
element.definition: Source of the definition for the extension code - a logical name or a URL.
element.short: identifies the meaning of the extension

element.definition: Value of extension - may be a resource or one of a constrained set of the data types (see Extensibility in the spec for list).
